transfer.ColumnsFilter.exclude_columns.u: If you need to list column names, it is better to start with the ^ character and end with the $ character â€” this will help avoid unwanted side effects.
transfer.ColumnsFilter.include_columns.u: If you need to list column names, it is better to start with the ^ character and end with the $ character - this will help avoid unwanted side effects.
transfer.DBTTransformer.git_branch.title: Git branch
transfer.DBTTransformer.git_branch.usage: A branch or a tag of the git repository with the DBT project.
transfer.DBTTransformer.git_repository_l: A link to a git repository with a DBT project. Must start with `https://`. The root directory of the repository must contain a `dbt_project.yml` file.
transfer.DBTTransformer.operation.title: Operation
transfer.DBTTransformer.profile_name.usa: The name for a profile which will be created automatically using the settings of the destination endpoint. The name must match the `profile` property in the `dbt_project.yml` file.
transfer.FilterRowsTransformer.filters.u: Rows satisfying at least one of the filters will be transferred. More information in documentation.
transfer.Health.alert.dta_01_dataplane_i: Transfer may not start or may be not working correctly. Please, contact service support
transfer.Health.alert.dta_02_no_items_in: Transfer writes less data than reads from source
The reason may be throughput issues on target side
transfer.Health.alert.dta_03_transfer_ti: Transfer time is too high or increasing
Increase of transfer time may be caused by growing source event amount or target throughput issues
transfer.Health.alert.dta_04_row_max_lag: Increase of transfer lag may be caused by growing source event amount, target throughput issues or lack of runtime resources for transfer
transfer.Health.alert.dta_05_replication: Repeating replication restarts may be sign of source or target problem or insufficient amount of RAM for transfer
transfer.ManualSettings.network_id.title: VPC Network ID
transfer.Metric.bytes.title: Bytes read
transfer.Metric.bytes.usage: Number of bytes read from source
transfer.Metric.rows.title: Rows written
transfer.Metric.rows.usage: Number of lines written to the target
transfer.ObjectStorage.access_key.title: Access Key
transfer.ObjectStorage.bucket.title: Bucket
transfer.OperationSummary.duration.title: Duration
transfer.RenameTable.new_name.title: Target table name
transfer.RenameTable.original_name.title: Source table name
transfer.SQLTransformer.query.title: SQL Script
transfer.SQLTransformer.query.usage: Script would be applied on-the-fly to all data. As SQL engine used Clickhouse Local. For queries there is a common `table` source for data. For example `SELECT * FROM table` query. No state is saved. Data window is linear, but with random size. Local clickhouse run with `--no-system-tables` flag, which disables all system tables / dictionaries.
transfer.Table.name.title: Table name
transfer.Table.name_space.title: Named schema
transfer.Table.name_space.usage: For Postgresql, specify the schema of the table, or the name of the database in other cases. If the source does not support schema and/or database abstractions, then this field should be left empty.
transfer.TableSplitterTransformer.splitt: A string separating the parts of the new table name.
transfer.TablesFilter.exclude_tables.usa: If you need to list table names, it's best to start with a ^ and end with a $ to avoid unwanted side effects.
transfer.TablesFilter.include_tables.usa: If you need to list table names, it's best to start with a ^ and end with a $ to avoid unwanted side effects.
